attributes.action: Give Funding To All Air Ambulance Operations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please Sign This Petition For The Government To Give Funding To All Air Ambulance Operations, As These Are Vital To The Survival Of Many Casualties And Patients That Have To Rely On The Good Will And Genorosity Of The General Public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
